Blog.post: back frm chalet... tt chalet SUX... tts all i can say... wat a lousy one... bt... oso kinda gd... cuz noe meimei... haha... chat with her is fun... she is so kawaii... haha... kinda bored... hmwk not done... everyting not done... all mess up... den juz nw quarrel wit sis... fuck man... arg... wat a bad day... life sux!!!!

Ohayo gozaimasu... haha... actually woke up at 8:00... 5 more min later need to call someone to wake her up... haha... piggy piggy... ask her dun slpz so late le bt she dun listen haha... den juz nw say v tired... gonna let her slpz alittle more... haha... wonder if pat remembers wat to do... lolz... its so early... haiz... goin chalet today...hopefully everyting turns out fine... sad* cuz 3dayz cant go online... n cant blog... haiz...=- -=8:30 poor little one... gonna b late... haiz... nvm... i gonna go prepare... if not i will b e one late... haha... sianz... yawn*=-

-=11:32am juz woke up... dunno wat happen ytd... sudden feel so weird... no mood... haiz... n havin headache... so went to slp... arg!!! got a v weird dream... (im in war time... those ancient china type... im a archer... wit a partner... dunno who is he... erm... den we went to fight a battle... theres a big tall guy... my enermy... like a rock so huge so hard... my arrow cant even heard him... like e one in "punisher"... n i got into v serious injury... dunno y i like can feel e pain after i woke up... bt mi n partner finally ran pass tt rock den kill e leader... den all e enermy flee... wat a stupid story... waste my time dreamim it...=- -=13:20 fuck man... stupid chalet tinggy... didn go wit plan... sudden change at e last day... wtf... dun feel like goin liao... wat e hell... wat lao... tis is makin mi mad... arg!!!=- -=18:55 sort of juz woke up... hav been slpin e whole day... bt stil tired... die... hmwk hav nt done... no enough time... goin chalet til wed... den thurs go back sch do hmwk... den thurs nite go m'sia... den sun den come back... how!!! help.... so rush... life sux....!!!!!
